name: StatementTarget

contact.name: Visit the Github repository for more information

description: the target of a Statement. StatementTarget represents one of a literal value, a reference to a non-entity type resource, an entity,  or an anonymous blank BNODE.

element.definition: the target of a Statement. StatementTarget represents one of a literal value, a reference to a non-entity type resource, an entity,  or an anonymous blank BNODE.

element.name: externalIdentifier
element.short: an external identifier that has been assigned to the statement with this particular target by the authoring body
element.definition:
an external identifier that has been assigned to the statement with this particular target by the authoring body. As an example, this would carry the SctId if the authoring body were
					SNOMED-CT

element.name: entity
element.short: the URI and optional namespace/name when the target type is ENTITY
element.definition: the URI and optional namespace/name when the target type is ENTITY

element.name: literal
element.short: the literal target when the statement type is LITERAL
element.definition: the literal target when the statement type is LITERAL.

element.name: resource
element.short: the resource URI when the statement type is RESOURCE
element.definition: the resource URI when the statement type is RESOURCE

element.name: bnode
element.short: a collection of statements about an anonymous subject
element.definition: a collection of statements about an anonymous subject
